T13bghsic_u:1223: ko vābhyupāyo bhuvane mama syādityāśu cintājvaranirduto 'bhūt // 9.83 //
T13bghsic_u:1224: iti śrībuddhaghoṣaviracite padyacūḍāmaṇināmni mahākāvye navamaḥ sargaḥ //
T13bghsic_u:1250: āviścakāra bhuvaneṣu paraṃ nipīḍāmāḍambaraḥ paṭahajo madanaprayāṇe // 10.12 //
T13bghsic_u:1252: naukā ivoddhurasarasvati naṣṭamārgā bhremurbhṛśaṃ surapathe sumanovimānāḥ // 10.13 //
T13bghsic_u:1264: kalpakṣayo 'miti kaiṭabhajid bhrameṇa bhūyo 'pi viśvamudare parihartumaicchat // 10.19 //
T13bghsic_u:1274: pātālaloka iva bhūvalayo babhūva bhūsanniveśa iva puṇyakṛtāṃ nivāsaḥ // 10.24 //
T13bghsic_u:1276: bhūmīdharāḥ paramabhūmidharā babhūvuḥ śeṣo 'pi kevalamabhūt phaṇamālabhārī // 10.25 //
T13bghsic_u:1278: pāthodhayaḥ sapadi paṅkadhayastadāsan pāthodharā nabhasi paṅkadharā babhūvuḥ // 10.26 //
T13bghsic_u:1281: senāmbudhau jayipadātimahāpravāhe magnāḥ kulakṣitidharā iva vāraṇendrāḥ /
T13bghsic_u:1282: tvaṅgattaraṅganivahā iva tuṅgavāhāa naumaṇḍalā iva rathāḥ sutarāṃ virejuḥ // 10.28 //
T13bghsic_u:1284: ambhonidhiṃ nijabalodadhinā vijitya bandīkṛtā iva tadīyapurandhrivargāḥ //
T13bghsic_u:1294: śuddhātmanāmakṛtadānaphalonnatīnāṃ kiṃ kiṃ na sidhyati kṛtākṣayapakṣakāṇām // 10.34 //
T13bghsic_u:1296: kuṇṭhīkṛtātmagatayaḥ kusumāstrabāṇāḥ kṛtyā iva pratinivṛtya tameva jaghnuḥ // 10.35 //
T13bghsic_u:1298: taṃ sthūlalakṣamupagamya na dānalābhaṃ ko vā dadātu guṇahīnaviceṣṭitāya // 10.36 //
T13bghsic_u:1300: āsādya buddhamabhajan sumanomayatvaṃ satsaṅgatiḥ suralateva na kiṃ karoti // 10.37 //
T13bghsic_u:1302: sadyo gateṣu mṛdutāṃ sa hi śambarārirvyāroṣadagdhahṛdayo mṛdutāṃ na bheje // 10.38 //
T13bghsic_u:1303: cetobhavasya saphalā api sāyakāste taṃ prāpya śāntahṛdayaṃ viphalā babhūvuḥ /
T13bghsic_u:1304: daive sameyuṣi parāṅmukhatāṃ hi sarvaṃ hastopayātamapi hanta/
T13bghsic_u:1311: taṃ prātya sarvaguṇabhāraguruṃ munīndraṃ na prāgabhavaccalayituṃ sa mahājavo 'pi /
T13bghsic_u:1312: naitad vicitramakhilāṭavighasmarasya dāvānalasya na hi mūrchati śaktirapsu // 10.42 //
T13bghsic_u:1316: āpūritā paramapāramikā mayaiva tatsākṣiṇī mama mahāpṛtanetyavocat // 10.44 //
T13bghsic_u:1318: māraḥ palāyata tato mahatā balena bhraṣṭātapatrarathaketukuthena bhītaḥ // 10.45 //
T13bghsic_u:1322: karṇāmṛtāni vacanāni ca kātarākṣyaḥ kāmāṅganā vidadhire karuṇākṣarāṇi // 10.47 //
T13bghsic_u:1324: utpāṭya locanayugaṃ dvijapuṅgavāya tvāṃ dattavāniti kathaṃ bruvate purāṇāḥ // 10.48 //
T13bghsic_u:1328: ucchīdya mastakamudastaripuprabhāvaṃ tvāṃ dattavāniti vadanti kathaṃ kavīndrāḥ // 10.50 //
T13bghsic_u:1331: asmāsu kāmapi vadhūmadhiropaya tvaṃ vakṣastaṭe mahati meruśilāviśāle // 10.51 //
T13bghsic_u:1346: iti buddhaghoṣaviracite padyacūḍāmaṇināmni mahākāvye siddhārthacarite daśamaḥ sargaḥ //
